title: KILL SWITCH
content:
Section 2.7: KILL SWITCH

OBSERVATION:
Based on discussions with the insured representative, the insured has provided a kill 
switch to cut off the electrical supply to each shop unit. However, we noted that the kill 
switch is not locked, which could allow unauthorized personnel to access it.

RECOMMENDATION:
The kill switch for each individual shop unit is located at the rear of the unit. It is installed 
to cut off the power supply to each unit and is turned off after operating hours, typically 
between 11 pm and 12 am every day by the insured personnel stationed at the site. 
However, the kill switch is not properly locked, which could allow unauthorized access.  
We recommend that the kill switch be properly locked to prevent unauthorized access. 
Alternatively, the kill switch can be installed in a centralized location within a single 
enclosure and securely locked, as implemented at the Shah Alam branch (refer photo 
below).

REGULATION/GUIDELINE:
Not applicable
